reviewtext: I use them to label my spray bottles,boxes and many others things and they have yet to fall off. Perfect so far and only $5 &change,I first started using the paper labels on my collectible magazine/comics & I was so impressed after 8/10 years they have yet to peel off.I only which the rolls would  be longer maybe 18/20 feet.
summary: Perfect labels stick on every thing so far!
